import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import '../components/dashboard.css'; import { FaUsers, FaBuilding, FaCalendarCheck, FaUserCheck, FaPlus, FaEye, FaCog, FaBell, FaClock, FaCheckCircle, FaExclamationTriangle, FaChartLine, FaUserPlus, FaCalendarAlt } from 'react-icons/fa'; const Dashboard = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); if (!user) { return (

); } return (

)} {user?.role === 'Employee' && (

Employee Dashboard

View and update your personal information
Check your attendance records and history
View department updates and announcements
)}
); }; export default Dashboard;
